android.view
接口 ViewManager

所有已知子接口：
WindowManager
所有已知实现类：
AbsListView, AbsoluteLayout, AbsSpinner, AdapterView, AppWidgetHostView, DatePicker, DialerFilter, ExpandableListView, FrameLayout, Gallery, GridView, HorizontalScrollView, ImageSwitcher, LinearLayout, ListView, MediaController, RadioGroup, RelativeLayout, ScrollView, SlidingDrawer, Spinner, TabHost, TableLayout, TableRow, TabWidget, TextSwitcher, TimePicker, TwoLineListItem, ViewAnimator, ViewFlipper, ViewGroup, ViewSwitcher, WebView, ZoomControls
public interface ViewManager

Interface to let you add and remove child views to an Activity. To get an instance of this class, call Context.getSystemService().

方法摘要
 void addView(View view, ViewGroup.LayoutParams params)
           
 void removeView(View view)
           
 void updateViewLayout(View view, ViewGroup.LayoutParams params)

                      ViewGroup.LayoutParams params)
